Uses of Package
scotty.database

  • Packages that use scotty.database 
    Package Description
    scotty.database
    This package contains the data model database related code for Scotty.
    scotty.database.parser
    This package contains the parsing and internal code for the Scotty database.
    scotty.template
    This package contains the template related code for Scotty.
  • Classes in scotty.database used by scotty.database 
    Class and Description
    Context
    A Context is a set of attributes, that can inherit attributes from its parent and contain sub-contexts within it.
    Database
    A Scotty database, basically a context with a contained map of Types.
    Value
    The values of a Scotty attribute.
  • Classes in scotty.database used by scotty.database.parser 
    Class and Description
    Context
    A Context is a set of attributes, that can inherit attributes from its parent and contain sub-contexts within it.
    Database
    A Scotty database, basically a context with a contained map of Types.
    Type
    A Type in a Scotty database.
  • Classes in scotty.database used by scotty.template 
    Class and Description
    Context
    A Context is a set of attributes, that can inherit attributes from its parent and contain sub-contexts within it.
    Database
    A Scotty database, basically a context with a contained map of Types.
